articles.description: On Friday, September 8 (expiry day), the Sensex Call Option of 67,000 strike saw a sudden surge: in under a minute, it jumped from Rs 4.30 to Rs 209.25. This is presumably due to a freak trade, which has caused a lot of heartache and financial losses to some …

articles.author: Nigel D'Souza
articles.title: Why is Coal India burning bright again — 4 key factors fuelling the upturn - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Coal India's shares soared 19 percent over the week, making it the top performer on the Nifty 50 index. This rally marked the highest weekly gain for the company since its IPO back in 2010.

articles.author: Jomy Jos Pullokaran
articles.title: UCO Bank hikes lending rates by 5 bps across tenures — details here - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The revised marginal cost of funds-based lending (MCLR) rate is effective from September 10. Shares of UCO Bank Ltd ended at Rs 35.08, up by Rs 0.66, or 1.92 percent on the BSE.
